parse.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth Anthology

links.*: EA's The Battle for Middle-earth II
The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II: The Rise of the Witch-king

wikitext.*:
'''The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth Anthology''' is a box set of three video games for the PC by [[Electronic Arts]]. The set was released on [[1 March|March 1]], [[2007]], and consists of the following games:

* [[EA's The Battle for Middle-earth|The Lord of the Rings:The Battle for Middle-earth]]
* [[EA's The Battle for Middle-earth II|The Lord of the Rings:The Battle for Middle-earth II]]
* [[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II: The Rise of the Witch-king]] (expansion)

==External links==
* [http://www.amazon.com/Rings-Battle-Middle-Earth-Anthology/dp/B000N4JEN2 Purchase at Amazon]
